title: Q 1 - Using which of the following way can you embed PHP code in an HTML page?
answer_3: C - <script language='php'> PHP code goes here </script>

title: Q 2 - Which of the following is correct about constants vs variables in PHP?
answer_1: A - There is no need to write a dollar sign ($) before a constant, where as in Variable one has to write a dollar sign.
answer_2: B - Constants cannot be defined by simple assignment, they may only be defined using the define() function.
